summary: Sidebar/mobile navigation was updated to use button click handlers that call smoothScrollToAnchor (with reduced-motion support) and close the mobile sheet, and the scroll utility was updated to account for sticky-header height. However, the diff evidence does not confirm that the required in-page section ID "create-wish" exists exactly once on the landing page, nor that all required sections have the consistent scroll margin.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the landing page contains a single set of in-page sections with the exact IDs used by sidebar navigation: home, create-wish, templates, marketplace, pricing, dashboard, faq.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows sections with ids home (via summary), templates, marketplace, pricing, dashboard, and faq, but provides no evidence of any section element with id="create-wish", nor evidence that there is exactly one element per required ID across the document.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HeroSection.tsx mentions id="home"; no mention of create-wish)

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply a consistent safe scroll margin to all main sections targeted by sidebar navigation so headings/content are visible below the sticky header after navigation.
missing_requirements.reason: Several sections shown include className="scroll-mt-16", but the diff does not provide evidence for the "create-wish" target section having the same scroll margin (and the create-wish section itself is not evidenced).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HeroSection.tsx mentions scroll-mt-16; no evidence for create-wish)

hallucinated_features.description: Added React Query-based data fetching/mutations hooks (download history, saved templates, creator earnings, record download, save template).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (request is strictly about in-page sidebar smooth scrolling and header offset).

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard section behavior expanded to include authenticated/unauthenticated UI and queries for downloads/saved templates/earnings, plus admin panel hooks and an auth entry dialog.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; exceeds the scope of a navigation/scroll fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Marketplace section includes search/filter UI and a create listing dialog flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; unrelated to sidebar smooth-scroll behavior.
